biography: Christian Bégin is a Canadian filmmaker from Quebec City specializing in ski and mountain bike films. In 1997, Bégin and his business partner Bjørn Enga formed the production company Radical Films Inc. Bégin graduated with a diploma course in Ski Area Management, Resort Operation and Marketing in 1998. The next year, he moved from Quebec to British Columbia. He also co-founded Bella Coola Heli Sports with Peter Mattsson and Beat Steiner. However, Bégin sold his part of the heliski company in July 2018 in order to pursue other opportunities.
name: Christian Bégin
